strapiPost.title: Global Business Acquires Fayetteville Tech Startup
strapiPost.content:
A Fayetteville tech startup was recently acquired by a global business based in the United Kingdom to bring human connection to a digital world. 

  • More personal: The Fayetteville startup, Gratavid, is a video platform that helps organizations stay connected to their donors through personalized videos. The platform recently merged with Graduway + Gravyty, which have operations in the U.S., Canada, and Israel. 
  • Trifecta: With Gravidad joining Graduway + Gravyty, it creates an ecosystem of products that automate the way communication flows within non-profits and education organizations. The trio now work with 2,500+ schools, colleges, non-profits, and healthcare organizations globally.
